free: #e Today, I am going to tell a story about our ancestors coming from Yi-lan.
#c 今天我要講一個故事, 是有關我們祖先起源於宜蘭的故事。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Some time ago in Yi-lan there were many farms and lands of our ancestors’.
#c 從前在宜蘭有很多我們祖先的水田和土地。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e Then, Han people arrived there…went to Yi-lan.
#c 然後就有漢人到了宜蘭去。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e They were good at planning how to obtain our ancestors’ farms.
#c 他們很懂得計畫該如何才能得到祖先們的水田。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Since Kavalan people have many superstitions, such as something about witches.
#c 由於噶瑪蘭人有很多的迷信, 比方說巫師之類的東西。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e They think so.
#c 他們如此認為。

free: #e When there is something dirty (unclean) in a place, they will abandon that place.
#c 某個地方有髒東西的時候, 他們就會放棄那裡。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Others knew it.
#c 別人知道了這件事。

free: #e The Han people knew the customs of Kavalan, so they did so.
#c 漢人知道了噶瑪蘭的習俗, 所以他們就那樣。

free: #e They left dead dogs or chickens in the farm.
#c 他們把死狗或死雞丟到水田裡。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Our ancestors saw them (dead dogs or chickens in the farm).
#c 我們的祖先們就看到了(田裡死去的狗或雞)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e ‘How come there are such dead things.’ ‘That kind of things are bad,’ thought our ancestors.
#c 怎麼會有這樣的死掉的東西,那樣的東西不好,我們的祖先這樣想。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e (They) left them there and surrounded (that place). The land cannot be plowed, thought the elders.
#c 他們把地留在那裡不管,並且把它圍起來,這個田就不能耕作了,老人們這麼想。
#n baqian=ti  aizipna, old=PFV  3SG.NOM, 老=完成  3SG.主格, ‘He is old.’

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e The land which had not been plowed for a long time was seen by the Hans.
#c 那個很久沒有人耕作的田被漢人看到了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e (You) haven’t plowed this land for a long time.
#c 你們很久沒有耕作這塊田了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e It’s my turn, thought the Hans, to occupy the farms of the (Kavalan) ancestors there.
#c “輪到我佔據(噶瑪蘭)祖先那邊的田地了”, 漢人這麼想。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e The land was originally wide and large, but became smaller gradually.
#c 土地本來很寬大,但不知不覺地漸漸變小了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Our ancestors there saw it.
#c 我們的祖先看了之後。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e We had no farms here.
#c 我們這邊沒有田了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e It’s useless for us to stay here.
#c 我們在這邊也沒用, 幹嘛留在這裡呢。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e They think they should leave (so) they left for the south.
#c 他們想說乾脆離開好了,(所以)他們就往南遷移。
#n imis: north
#n wakay: east
#n zaya: west
#n qawanan: right
#n qawili: left
#n babaw: top
#n libeng: bottom
#n pasa tiboR=pa=iku, toward	south=FUT=1SG.NOM, 往 南=未來=1SG.主格, ‘我要往南走’

free: #e (They) left for Hualien by raft, boat, or on foot.
#c (他們)搭竹筏,搭船,或走路遷移往花蓮。
#n buRaw是指群體遷移

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e The place where they arrived first is Hualien.
#c 他們首先到達的地方是花蓮。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e In qeliawanan.
#c 有到那個茄禮村, 到達茄禮村。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e ‘It is so wide here and is thus a good place for living,’ said they.
#c 他們說, ‘這裡很寬,是可以住的好地方。
#n qaizuwan-an-ku, live-NMZ-1SG.GEN, 住-名物化-1SG.屬格, ‘my place’

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e They plowed here.
#c 他們在這裡開墾了。

free: #e After a long time, there (came) Japanese governing these people.
#c 過了很久,有日本人來管理這些人。
#n ma-quan-ay, MA-govern-REL, MA-管-關係詞, ‘被管的人’

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e After seeing this, (our ancestors) probably thought that how the Japanese governed the people was bad.”
#c 看了之後,(我們祖先)可能認為管理的方式不好。
#n qawtu  sayza, come	maybe, 來 可能, ‘可能會來’
#n mawtu  sayza, AF.come	maybe, 主焦.來 可能, ‘可能來過’

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e They fought against the Japanese.
#c 就跟日本人打。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Kavalan and Amis there lost.
#c 噶瑪蘭和阿美族輸了。

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e (They) are afraid of being caught by the Japanese so transferred to another place again.
#c 怕被日本人抓到, (他們)再換地方。
#n matalin: 換(位置/地方/公司)
#n quqang: 換(東西)

free: #e To qoRo' and taqemuan.
#c 往那個磯萁和龜庵。

#c 有到龜庵,有到新社。

free: #e To kulis, qeladut and chenggong.
#c 有到立德,往那個方向再到樟原和成功。

free: #e Our ancestors went ashore there in Sinshe.
#c 我們的祖先在新社那邊停下來上岸。

free: #e After landing, they saw the mountains there.
#c 上岸後, 看到那裡的山。

free: #e There are rivers and mountains and (the place) is near the sea, said they
#c 有河,有山,又靠近海邊,他們說。
#n pazaki  aiku   timaizipana
#n approach	1SG.NOM	3SG.OBL
#n 接近	1SG.主格		3SG.斜格
#n ‘我靠近他’

free: #e We Kavalan people like the place with water.
#c 我們噶瑪蘭人喜歡有水的(地方)。

free: #e With water, we can survive, said they.
#c 他們說,有水我們可以生存。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Thus, (they stayed) in Xinshe.
#c 所以就在新社。

free: #e Near the sea, near the mountain, (and) near a river.
#c 靠近海邊,靠近山,靠近河,那樣” 。

free: #e All the Xinshe people now were there.
#c 現在新社的所有的人在那邊。

free: #e Till now it has been a long time.
#c 一直到現在,時間也很久了。
#n nizi  taziyan  tuzus  sinsia
#n from  here  to  PN
#n 從  這裡	到  新社
#n ‘從這裡到新社’

free: #e We do not know how many hundred years (have passed).
#c 我們不知道已經多少百年了。

free: #e Life of Kavalan here in Xinshe is good.
#c 噶瑪蘭在新社這裡的生活很好。
#n qa-binus 	aiku  taziyan
#n FUT-live	1SG.NOM	here
#n 未來-活	1SG.主格		這裡
#n ‘我在這裡可以活下去’
#n qena-binus-an-ku  	 taziyan
#n QENA-live--LF-1SG.GEN	here
#n QENA-活-處焦-1SG.屬格	這裡
#n ‘這裡是我生長的地方’

free: #e In addition, the children had grown up and wanted to make money so they went here again to Taipei to work.
#c 另外,小孩長大了想要賺錢,又再去到台北這裡工作。

free: #e Only the elder stay there, watching houses and farms.
#c 只剩下老人家留守家裡與看守田地。

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Elders, thanks for your hard work, said I.
#c 我說,老人家你們辛苦了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

gloss: 努力-重疊-努力=未來=1EPL.主格

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e We will work hard here in Taipei.
#c 我們在台北這裡會認真工作。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e That’s what I said. Thanks.
#c 我說的就這樣.謝謝。
